hero.title: Step into the future of agriculture. Connect directly with farmers, access real-time market data, and grow your agricultural business through our comprehensive ecosystem.

marketplacePreview.title: Step Into Our
marketplacePreview.description: Discover the beauty of sustainable agriculture through our curated marketplace. Connect directly with farmers and experience authentic, fresh produce.

stats.productsDescription: Fresh produce from verified farmers across the beautiful landscapes of Ethiopia
stats.verifiedDescription: Trusted sellers with quality guarantee, ensuring sustainable and authentic products
stats.fastDeliveryDescription: Direct farm-to-market logistics network, bringing nature's bounty to your doorstep

weatherPreview.title: Smart
weatherPreview.description: Get real-time weather data and agricultural recommendations for your location.

farmingTips.title: Farming Tips
farmingTips.recommendation: Ideal conditions for planting. Consider irrigation for next week.

advisoryPreview.title: Expert
advisoryPreview.description: Learn from agricultural experts, access training courses, and get personalized farming advice.

marketplace.title: Agricultural Marketplace
marketplace.description: Connect directly with farmers and merchants. Trade quality produce at competitive prices.

heatWave.title: Heat Wave Alert
heatWave.message: Extreme heat conditions. Increase irrigation and provide crop shade.

coldWave.title: Cold Wave Alert
coldWave.message: Cold conditions detected. Protect sensitive crops from frost damage.

highHumidity.title: High Humidity Alert
highHumidity.message: Increased risk of fungal diseases. Monitor crops closely.

strongWinds.title: Strong Winds Alert
strongWinds.message: Protect tall crops and seedlings from wind damage.

noActiveAlerts.title: No Active Alerts
noActiveAlerts.message: Weather conditions are favorable for farming activities

irrigation.title: Irrigation
irrigation.description: Increase watering frequency due to high temperatures

drainage.title: Drainage
drainage.description: Ensure proper drainage to prevent waterlogging

fertilization.title: Fertilization
fertilization.description: Apply fertilizers for optimal crop growth

mulching.title: Mulching
mulching.description: Apply mulch to retain soil moisture

extremeHeat.title: Extreme Heat Alert
extremeHeat.message: Consider additional irrigation and provide shade for sensitive crops

highTemperature.title: High Temperature
highTemperature.message: Increase watering frequency and monitor for heat stress

frostRisk.title: Frost Risk
frostRisk.message: Protect crops from frost damage and delay outdoor planting

coolWeather.title: Cool Weather
coolWeather.message: Good conditions for cool-season crops like lettuce and spinach

perfectTemperature.title: Perfect Temperature
perfectTemperature.message: Ideal conditions for most crop growth and outdoor activities

highHumidityAlert.title: High Humidity Alert
highHumidityAlert.message: Monitor for fungal diseases and ensure proper ventilation

lowHumidity.title: Low Humidity
lowHumidity.message: Increase irrigation and consider mulching to retain moisture

goodHumidity.title: Good Humidity
goodHumidity.message: Optimal moisture levels for healthy plant growth

rainfallDetected.title: Rainfall Detected
rainfallDetected.message: Great natural irrigation! Reduce manual watering accordingly

clearSkies.title: Clear Skies
clearSkies.message: Perfect conditions for outdoor farm activities and harvesting

highWindAlert.title: High Wind Alert
highWindAlert.message: Secure tall plants and avoid pesticide spraying

lowPressureSystem.title: Low Pressure System
lowPressureSystem.message: Weather changes possible - monitor forecasts closely

advisory.title: Expert Agricultural Advisory

directMarketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
directMarketplace.description: Connect directly with farmers and buyers, eliminating middlemen and maximizing profits for everyone.

integratedPayments.title: Integrated Payments
integratedPayments.description: Secure and fast payment processing with multiple Ethiopian payment methods and cryptocurrencies.

financialGrowth.title: Financial Growth
financialGrowth.description: Build your selling history and credit score to access better loan opportunities and financial services.

smartAnalytics.title: Smart Analytics
smartAnalytics.description: Advanced analytics and insights to help you make informed decisions and optimize your agricultural business.
